file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 31-31-01-04 - FLIGHT DATA RECORDER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FLIGHT DATA RECORDER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the flight data recorder (FDR). B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 31-31-01-000-801-A FLIGHT DATA RECORDER - REMOVAL FLIGHT DATA RECORDER - INSTALLA- ALL 31-31-01-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 31-31-01 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 31-31-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. FLIGHT DATA RECORDER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the flight data recorder (FDR). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage rear section Ι - Right side D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY To get access to the rear electronic compart- GSE 036 Platform, Hydraulic, Aircraft ment E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put up the hydraulic platform (GSE 036) at the necessary height. (2) Open the access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). J. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) For aircraft equipped with Honeywell FDR refer to Figure 401. (2) For aircraft equipped with L3 FDR refer to Figure 402. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 31-31-01 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) On the circuit breaker panel, open the FDR circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it. (4) Loosen the two knurled nuts (2) that attach the FDR (1) to the mounting rack (3). (5) Pull the FDR (1) forward to release it from the mounting rack (3). (6) Remove the FDR (1) from the mounting rack (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 31-31-01 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

SSFDR 3. MOUNTING TRAY 2. KNURLED NUTS DET. B 145AMM310003.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 31-31-01 Page 4 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ON ACFT WITH L3 FDR Solid State Flight Data Recorder (SSFDR) - Removal/Installation Figure 402 B A ZONE 271 REAR ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT 1. SSFDR DET. A 3. MOUNTING TRAY DET. B 2. KNURLED NUTS EM145AMM310523A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 31-31-01 Page 5 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 31-31-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. FLIGHT DATA RECORDER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the flight data recorder (FDR). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM TASK 31-31-00-700-802-A/500 FLIGHT DATA RECORDER - OPERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage rear section Ι - Right side D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY To get access to the rear electronic compart- GSE 036 Platform, Hydraulic, Aircraft ment E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear electronic compartment I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) For aircraft equipped with Honeywell FDR refer to Figure 401. (2) For aircraft equipped with L3 FDR refer to Figure 402. (3) Put the FDR (1) on the mounting rack (3). (4) Carefully push the FDR (1) to the rear of the mounting rack (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 31-31-01 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (5) Make sure that the connector of the mounting rack (3) and the connector of the FDR (1) connect correctly to each other. (6) Tighten the two knurled nuts (2) to attach the FDR (1) to the mounting rack (3). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from the FDR circuit breaker and close it. (2) Do the FDR system operational test ( AMM TASK 31-31-00-700-802-A/500). (3) Close the access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (4) Remove the hydraulic platform (GSE 036). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 31-31-01 Page 7 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
